title: Files re: Prosecution and Investigation of Damon Cobb (Prince George's County Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All records related to the investigation of Damon Demetrius Cobb for the murder of Gerald Carlton Weaver on July 21, 1992, including records of witnesses contacted and resulting interview notes and/or transcripts.
- All records related to the prosecution of Damon Demetrius Cobb for the murder of Gerald Carlton Weaver on July 21, 1992.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marc Howard

title: University of California Irvine PRA Databases

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1 — any databases and/or spreadsheets used to track requests under the California Public Records Act from January 1, 2024 to the date of this request.
2 — any and all policy documents, manuals, memos and/or reports regarding the processing of public records requests from January 1, 2024 to the date of this request.

In the regard to the database requested in paragraph 1, please provide the database in its original electronic format pursuant to Cal. Gov. Code § 6253.9.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ed Burton
